pr_title: Closes #953 - Renamed AccessTokenRecord property from access_token_type to token_type

timeline.message: Code changes for picking up legacy field by deprecated name

Revert "Code changes for picking up legacy field by deprecated name"

This reverts commit b652a2f5a1e2ca82c1af8700ba8848d9e106cac1.

Revert "Registering stub type adapter"

This reverts commit 27900d5f7cd2a5558d27292d7d3fcd4d40cb79ed.

Revert "Adding class stub"

This reverts commit 6ab68aade86cd4c0bb7164ea3ddd11ce4e36ab43.

timeline.author: AdamBJohnsonx
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -86,7 +93,7 @@
      * utilize the access token to make a protected resource request (along with type-specific
      * attributes).
      */
-    @SerializedName(ACCESS_TOKEN_TYPE)
+    @SerializedName(value = TOKEN_TYPE, alternate = ACCESS_TOKEN_TYPE)

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                     * Deprecated string of access token type.
          
          
            
                     * <strong>Deprecated<strong> string of access token type.  Prefer {@link #TOKEN_TYPE} instead.
timeline.author: AdamBJohnsonx
shahzaibj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -86,7 +93,7 @@
      * utilize the access token to make a protected resource request (along with type-specific
      * attributes).
      */
-    @SerializedName(ACCESS_TOKEN_TYPE)
+    @SerializedName(value = TOKEN_TYPE, alternate = ACCESS_TOKEN_TYPE)

replies.bodyText: Isn't that slick?? I didn't know Gson could do that until.... now 😅
replies.author: iambmelt
